item.title: Quarter End Close: 60 Hours of Accounting in One Week
item.description: No need to worry, my accountant handles that I usually donâ€™t write about my secret life of accounting, but this past week was a professional and intellectual doozy. My normal work week is about 40 to 45 hours of meetings, esoteric accounting principles and analyzing reams of numbers on Excel. Once a quarter though, all hell breaks loose in the accounting department and 60-70 hours are spent per person on closing up the books for the 10-Q.
